title: However, if podium is proposed it shall not extend beyond 6 m from building line so as to have clear open space of 6 m at ground level beyond accessible for fire appliances
clause_text: However, if podium is proposed it shall not extend beyond 6 m from building line so as to have clear open space of 6 m at ground level beyond accessible for fire appliances. No ramps for the podium shall be provided in these side open spaces.

source_pdf.text_snippet: However, if podium is proposed it shall not extend beyond 6 m from building line so as to have clear open space of 6 m at ground level beyond accessible for fire appliances.
